## Checklist

- [ ] Descriptive title using Conventional Commits (e.g., `feat:`, `fix:`)
- [ ] Linked issue(s) and clear description
- [ ] Lint passes locally (`backend: npm run lint`)
- [ ] Tests added/updated where appropriate
- [ ] Backend tests pass locally (`cd backend && npm test`)
- [ ] Env/config updated if needed (`.env`, Docker, secrets)
- [ ] Docs updated (`AGENTS.md`, `README.md`, or `docs/`)

## Deployment Notes

- [ ] Requires DB migration
- [ ] Requires config/secret changes
- [ ] Rollback plan noted
